defaultDescription: WiizDev delivers innovative digital solutions, web development, and technology consulting services. From concept to deployment, we build future-ready applications that drive business growth.

/.title: WiizDev - Growth-Driven Digital Solutions
/.description: Transform your business with innovative digital solutions. WiizDev specializes in modern web development, full-stack applications, and technology consulting services.

/about.title: About WiizDev - Our Story & Mission
/about.description: Learn about WiizDev's mission to deliver growth-driven digital solutions. Discover our team, values, and commitment to innovation in web development.

/projects.title: Our Projects - Portfolio & Case Studies
/projects.description: Explore WiizDev's portfolio of successful digital projects. From web applications to complex software solutions, see how we help businesses grow.

/all-projects.title: Complete Project Portfolio - WiizDev
/all-projects.description: Browse our complete collection of digital projects and case studies. Discover the full range of solutions WiizDev has delivered across industries.

/tech-stack.title: Technology Stack - Tools & Expertise
/tech-stack.description: Discover the cutting-edge technologies and tools WiizDev uses to build modern, scalable applications. From frontend to backend, we use the best in class.

/contact.title: Contact WiizDev - Start Your Project Today
/contact.description: Ready to transform your business with digital solutions? Contact WiizDev today for a consultation and let's discuss your next project.
